title: Delilah Hamlin joins glam sister Amelia at the launch of their clothing range
text:
They are both models who are regularly pictured together both in and out of the spotlight.

And Delilah Hamlin, 21, and her sister Amelia, 18, look as chic as ever as they stepped out for the launch of their new clothing range at Beauty and Essex restaurant in Hollywood on Friday.

The sisters certainly dressed to impress on the night as Delilah turned heads in a white, lace corset-style top paired with a pair of black cycle shorts.

Wow! Delilah Hamlin, 21, and her sister Amelia, 18, look as chic as ever as they stepped out for the launch of their new clothing range at Beauty and Essex restaurant in Hollywood on Friday

The American beauty teamed her ensemble with a crisp, white long-line blazer, a silver necklace and boosted her height with a towering pair of white, lace-up heels.

Delilah left her caramel locks to tumble over her shoulders in loose waves, while her make-up was perfectly applied.

Not one to be outdone, her younger sister Amelia was also out to impress, rocking a black, strapless top and baggy satin trousers.

Dressed to impress: Delilah turned heads in a white, lace corset-style top paired with a pair of black cycle shorts

Funky: Not one to be outdone, her younger sister Amelia was also out to impress, rocking a black, strapless top and baggy satin trousers

Off we go! The daughters of actors Lisa Rinna and Harry Hamlin looked fierce and confident as they made their way down their street towards the glittering bash

She added a simple pair of black heels and carried her essentials in a quilted black handbag.

Adding a touch of bling to her look, Amelia wore a a dazzling, layered silver necklace and a matching bracelet.

Accentuating her features, she coated her face in a layer of shimmering make-up, while her raven tresses were slicked back into a neat style.

The daughters of actors Lisa Rinna and Harry Hamlin looked fierce and confident as they made their way down their street towards the glittering bash.

Flawless: Delilah teamed her ensemble with a crisp, white long-line blazer, a silver necklace and boosted her height with a towering pair of white, lace-up heels

Rinna dropped the news of her daughters' upcoming 'athleisure' fashion line called, DNA, last week.

It is slated to be available online on October 21.

'It's Los Angeles, New York,' Delilah told Women's Wear Daily, adding that the company's target customers will be between the ages of 18 and 24.

The fashion line will include hoodies, bike shorts, and 18 other items, all of which have been priced between $38 and $118.
description: The sisters certainly dressed to impress on the night as they arrived at the Beauty and Essex restaurant in Hollywood on Friday for the launch of their 'athleisure' clothing range.
